definition: things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
if only it were so/I hope so (idiom)

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的轉變也是如此，和顛覆身體的生死一樣。

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是誰剪斷了琴絃，彈着如此斷腸的曲。

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，月光洗去了今晚天際中星星們昏暗的光。

sentences.english: Is she disgusted that he would so soon betray Anna?
sentences.chinese: 她是否爲他對安娜如此之快的背叛感到反感？

sentences.english: If you do, two loyalty counters are removed from that planeswalker.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此做，從該旅法師上移去兩個忠誠度指示物。

sentences.english: Also the Kui gets thus, otherwise, really fear that that horse will accept to can not stand them.
sentences.chinese: 也虧得如此，不然，真怕那匹馬會承受不了他們。

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我們的價值觀和民主權力而言，諸如此類都是如此。

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我們的價值觀和民主權力而言，諸如此類都是如此。

sentences.english: Be that as it may， the nerve poison does its business with man far more quickly than the blood poison.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，神經毒液毒殺人類比血毒液快得多。

sentences.english: Every polynomial is differentiable , and so is every rational .
sentences.chinese: 每個多項式都是可微的，而每個有理函數也是如此。

sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢華的祭奠也算不虛此行吧。

sentences.english: The USSR was so proud of the synchrophasotron.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯是如此爲這個加速器而自豪。

sentences.english: However, Massimo Ambronisi equalized in the 25th minute for Milan.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，安布羅西尼在25分鐘爲米蘭扳平了比分。

sentences.english: And as it is in the floral tribe, so it is in God's kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界如此，在天國也是如此。

sentences.english: And as it is in the floral tribe, so it is in God's kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界如此，在天國也是如此。

sentences.english: The mayor is so popular that he has the whole town under his thumb.
sentences.chinese: 市長如此深得人心，全城人都聽他的。

definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
how (wonderful etc)/what (a great idea etc)/however (difficult it may be etc)/(in interrogative sentences) how (much etc)/to what extent
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
from this, it can be seen that...
